quoteText: Public Disclosure    As a general rule, the City does not disclose any personally identifiable information collected online except where you have given us permission, or where the information is public information under the Pennsylvania Right to Know Act 65 P.S. 66.1 et seq., or other applicable laws. Visitors should be aware that information collected by the City on its website may be subject to examination and inspection, if such information is a public record and not otherwise protected from disclosure.
title: The service will not allow third parties to access your personal information without a legal basis

tosdr.case: The service will not allow third parties to access your personal information without a legal basis
